'''Kristoffer Jelbring''' is a former game developer at Mojang Studios, working on ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''. Prior to 2018, he was also a web developer. In December 2020, he left Mojang Studios.<ref>{{tweet|KrisJelbring|1344198435625463809|This week I left Mojang Studios after 9 years. It’s been an incredible journey which I will never forget. In 2021 I’ll pursue a new adventure, but more on that later!|30 December 2020}}</ref>
